document_name: Transforming the market for efficient lighting

outputs.output_descr: The goal of the project is to reduce GHG emissions in Russia by improving energy efficiency related to lighting. The objective of the project is to transform the lighting market in Russia through promotion of EEL technologies and systems, and phasing-out inefficient lighting. To reach the above goal and objective, the project seeks four outcomes: (1) Improved efficient lighting standards and policy frameworks; (2) Supply chain for energy efficient lighting is strengthened; (3) Energy efficient lighting is increased in Moscow residential and public buildings; (4) Energy-efficient street lighting is adopted in Nizhny Novgorod region.

project_descr: Transforming the market for efficient lighting in Russia
